name: Mimoona
description: Crowdfunding on any Website with any Com
overview:
Mimoona is disrupting crowdfunding by giving any website the ability to integrate “Kickstarter-like” functionality, enabling a site’s users to raise funds more efficiently, while the site gets additional revenue and a larger, more engaged community.

Our “plug & fund” enables any website to easily deploy a fully functioning crowdfunding platform on the website itself and adjust the look and feel to match the site’s in 30 minutes. That way, the site’s users will be able to fund as well as start a crowdfunding campaign related to the site’s domain. Also, the website owner can upload crowdfunding campaigns of its own.

In addition, Mimoona has great experience in the crowdfunding arena by owning and managing the largest crowdfunding platform in Israel.

milestones.description: Mimoona is part of Dreamit Ventures' accelerator program NYC (S2013)
milestones.source_description: 16 Startups Just Won Spots In One Of The Summer's Most Competitive Accelerator Programs  Read more: http://www.businessinsider.com/16-startups-just-won-spots-in-one-of-the-summers-most-competitive-accelerator-programs-
